entries.en-US: Types: feat, fix, refactor, docs, test, chore, perf, ci
entries.zh-Hans: 类型：feat, fix, refactor, docs, test, chore, perf, ci
注意：通过 ~/.claude/settings.json 全局禁用了归因。

entries.en-US:
1. Analyze full commit history (not just latest commit)
2. Use `git diff [base-branch]...HEAD` to see all changes
3. Draft comprehensive PR summary
4. Include test plan with TODOs
5. Push with `-u` flag if new branch
entries.zh-Hans:
1. 分析完整的提交历史（不仅仅是最近一次提交）
2. 使用 `git diff [base-branch]...HEAD` 查看所有更改
3. 起草全面的 PR 摘要
4. 包含带有 TODO 的测试计划
5. 如果是新分支，使用 `-u` 标志推送
